short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to download png, svg, jpeg, jpg files from a website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using this extension you will be able to download all graphic elements present on a website with a single click. Its hassle free and easy to use. You also have the option to download specific media types as well. For example, you can download just the png or the svg type graphics present on a webpage.
